Restoring the Configuration Settings

To restore a previously saved configuration file:

 1. Choose Administration > Backup/Restore Settings.

 2. In the Configuration Upload field, select the configuration to upload (Startup Configuration or Backup Configuration).

 3. Click Browse to locate the file.

 4. Select the file and click Open.

 5. Click Start to Upload.

The device uploads the configuration file and uses the settings it contains to update the Startup Configuration. The device then restarts and uses the new configuration.
